summary: Alfa Zero Overlay Demo Cut: play a curated emoji-runtime scene via Alfa 04, with narration sync and telemetry logging.
context: Toyfoundry (ORDER-040) and Toysoldiers (ORDER-041) are closed. High Command will now ship a playable demo slice that consumes emoji-runtime@1.0 sample chains through Alfa 04 and renders them in the Alfa 00 overlay with basic controls and monitoring.

directives.details: Ingest emoji-runtime@1.0 sample chains from Alfa 04. Add a loader in `golf_00/delta_00/alfa_00/overlay_bridge.py` that consumes outputs from `golf_00/delta_00/alfa_04/dispatch_sample_chains.py` (fallback: `golf_00/delta_00/alfa_04/sample_chains.json`). Validate with `tools/schema_validator.py`.

Implement basic playback controls and a narration sync indicator in `golf_00/delta_00/alfa_00/alfa_zero_ui.py` and `golf_00/delta_00/alfa_00/alfa_zero_controller.py` (states: green=sync, amber=late, red=drop).
Log demo sessions to `telemetry/emoji_runtime/demo_runs/ORDER-042-<session>.jsonl` with fields: session_id, chain_id, frame_ts, glyph, narration_text, sync_state, notes.

Run `golf_00/delta_00/alfa_00/overlay_test_harness.py` with the curated scene. Capture evidence: `logs/overlay_demo_run.log`, `telemetry/emoji_runtime/demo_runs/*.jsonl`, and any screenshots if available.
Document the demo run procedure and controls in `golf_00/delta_00/alfa_00/README.md` and align with `planning/alfa_zero_overlay_ui_plan.md`.
File `exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-11-01-042-report.json` including: steps executed, telemetry sample excerpt, sync indicator stats, screenshots/logs paths, and any follow-ups.

success_criteria: Overlay plays one curated emoji-runtime scene end-to-end without errors
Narration sync indicator remains green for ≥95% of frames
Telemetry JSONL written to `telemetry/emoji_runtime/demo_runs/` and validates
Runbook updated with clear start/stop and evidence capture steps
Completion report filed with links to logs/telemetry and next actions
safety_notes: Keep demo payloads lore‑aligned; avoid leaking internal paths in UI
Do not persist PII in telemetry; session_ids should be random nonces
Gate any screenshot capture behind an explicit flag
